casebody.data:
2002-1637 (La. 10/25/02)

Brian CADWALLADER, et al. v. ALLSTATE INSURANCE COMPANY, et al. No. 2002-C-1637. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Allstate Insurance Co. et al.;— Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. E, No. 90-8502; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2001-CA-1236.

Granted.
